TitleEnglish: Sound! Euphonium the Movie - Our Promise: A Brand New Day
SummaryEnglish: Kumiko is now a second year and one of the senior players of the euphonium section. With new underclassmen joining the concert band, Kumiko will have to learn new things in order to deal with awkward and difficult underclassmen.
Aliases: Gekijouban Hibike! Euphonium: Chikai no Finale
